title: How to redirect the output of a command into a text field!
question:
HI,


I am writing a checker for some CAD models, and I would like to use script Python that mimic the Analyze Diagnostics -> List, Check, Select Bad Objects,â€¦etc. I can run the _List command but Rhino display the results into a dialog. It is possible to capture into a string the results the command ? I am new in Rhino, so I am wandering if some one has a Python script that implement the _List command, or knows how to implement such a command ?


Regards,


Ion

code_blocks.code:
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs
import System

id = rs.GetObject("pick object up an object(s)", select = True)
rs.Command("_-List Clipboard")
clipboardText = System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetText()
print clipboardText
